00063 void EnterIMPVoices( void )
00064 {
00065   fVoiceAVisited = FALSE;
00066       fVoiceBVisited = FALSE;
00067       fVoiceCVisited = FALSE;
00068 
00069             // create buttons
00070       CreateIMPVoicesButtons( );
00071        
00072       // create mouse regions
00073       CreateIMPVoiceMouseRegions( );
00074 
00075       // render background
00076       RenderIMPVoices( );
00077 
00078       // play voice once
00079       uiVocVoiceSound = PlayVoice( );
00080 
00081       //if the character is a male
00082       if( fCharacterIsMale )
00083       {
00084             iLastVoice = 2;
00085       }
00086       else
00087       {
00088             iLastVoice = 2;
00089       }
00090 
00091       if( iCurrentVoices > iLastVoice )
00092       {
00093             iCurrentVoices = iLastVoice;
00094       }
00095 
00096       return;
00097 }

00100 void RenderIMPVoices( void )
00101 {
00102   
00103 
00104   // render background
00105       RenderProfileBackGround( );
00106 
00107       // the Voices frame
00108       RenderPortraitFrame( 191, 167 );
00109   
00110       // the sillouette
00111       RenderLargeSilhouette( 200, 176 );
00112 
00113       // indent for the text
00114       RenderAttrib1IndentFrame( 128, 65); 
00115 
00116       // render voice index value
00117       RenderVoiceIndex( );
00118 
00119       // text
00120       PrintImpText( );
00121 
00122       return;
00123 }

00137 
00138 void HandleIMPVoices( void )
00139 {
00140 
00141       // do we need to re write screen
00142       if ( fReDrawVoicesScreenFlag == TRUE ) 
00143       {
00144     RenderIMPVoices( );
00145             
00146             // reset redraw flag
00147             fReDrawVoicesScreenFlag = FALSE;
00148       }
00149       return;
00150 }

00154 
00155 void IncrementVoice( void )
00156 {
00157       // cycle to next voice
00158       
00159       iCurrentVoices++;
00160 
00161       // gone too far?
00162       if( iCurrentVoices > iLastVoice )
00163       {
00164             iCurrentVoices = 0;
00165       }
00166 
00167 
00168   return; 
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 void DecrementVoice( void )
00173 {
00174   // cycle to previous voice
00175       
00176       iCurrentVoices--;
00177 
00178       // gone too far?
00179   if( iCurrentVoices < 0 )
00180       {
00181     iCurrentVoices = iLastVoice;
00182       }
00183 
00184       return;
00185 }

00243 void DestroyIMPVoicesButtons( void )
00244 {
00245 
00246       // will destroy buttons created for IMP Voices screen
00247   
00248       // the next button
00249   RemoveButton(giIMPVoicesButton[ 0 ] );
00250   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPVoicesButtonImage[ 0 ] );
00251       
00252       // the previous button
00253   RemoveButton(giIMPVoicesButton[ 1 ] );
00254   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPVoicesButtonImage[ 1 ] );
00255       
00256       // the done button
00257   RemoveButton(giIMPVoicesButton[ 2 ] );
00258   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPVoicesButtonImage[ 2 ] );
00259 
00260       return;
00261 }

00263 
00264 void BtnIMPVoicesNextCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00265 {
00266 
00267       // btn callback for IMP attrbite begin button
00268       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00269             return;
00270 
00271       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00272       {
00273              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00274       }
00275       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00276       {
00277             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00278             {
00279       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00280       
00281                   // next voice!!
00282                   IncrementVoice( );
00283                   // play voice
00284                   if( ! SoundIsPlaying( uiVocVoiceSound ) )
00285                   {
00286         uiVocVoiceSound = PlayVoice( );
00287                   }     
00288                   else
00289                   {
00290                         SoundStop( uiVocVoiceSound );
00291                         uiVocVoiceSound = PlayVoice( );
00292                   }
00293 
00294       
00295                   fReDrawVoicesScreenFlag = TRUE;
00296             }
00297       }     
00298 } 
00299 
00300 void BtnIMPVoicesPreviousCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00301 {
00302 
00303       // btn callback for IMP attrbite begin button
00304       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00305             return;
00306 
00307       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00308       {
00309              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00310       }
00311       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00312       {
00313             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00314             {
00315       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00316       
00317                   // previous voice, please!!!
00318                   DecrementVoice( );
00319                   // play voice
00320                   if( ! SoundIsPlaying( uiVocVoiceSound ) )
00321                   {
00322         uiVocVoiceSound = PlayVoice( );
00323                   }     
00324                   else
00325                   {
00326                         SoundStop( uiVocVoiceSound );
00327                         uiVocVoiceSound = PlayVoice( );
00328                   }
00329 
00330                   fReDrawVoicesScreenFlag = TRUE;
00331             }
00332       }     
00333 } 
00334 
00335 void BtnIMPVoicesDoneCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00336 {
00337 
00338       // btn callback for IMP attrbite begin button
00339       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00340             return;
00341 
00342       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00343       {
00344              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00345       }
00346       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00347       {
00348             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00349             {
00350       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00351       
00352                   // go to main page
00353                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00354 
00355                   // if we are already done, leave
00356           if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__FINISH )
00357                   {
00358             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
00359                   } 
00360                   else
00361                   {
00362                         if( CameBackToVoicePageButNotFinished() )
00363                         {
00364                               iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00365                         }
00366                         else
00367                         {
00368                               iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__PERSONALITY;
00369                         }
00370                   }
00371 /*
00372                   // current mode now is voice
00373               else if( iCurrentProfileMode < IMP__PORTRAIT )
00374                   {
00375                         iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__PORTRAIT;
00376                   }
00377 
00378                   else if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__PORTRAIT )
00379                   {
00380                         // all done profiling
00381                         iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__VOICE;
00382                         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
00383                   }
00384 */
00385                   // set voice id, to grab character slot
00386       if( fCharacterIsMale == TRUE )
00387                   {
00388                         LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId = iCurrentVoices;
00389                   }
00390                   else
00391                   {
00392                         LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId = iCurrentVoices + 3;
00393                   }
00394 
00395                   // set button up image  pending
00396                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00397             }
00398       }     
00399 } 
00400 
00401 BOOLEAN CameBackToVoicePageButNotFinished()
00402 {
00403       //if we are in a page that comes after this one
00404       if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__PERSONALITY ||
00405                   iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__ATTRIBUTES )
00406       {
00407             return( TRUE );
00408       }
00409       else
00410       {
00411             return( FALSE );
00412       }
00413 }

00415 
00416 UINT32 PlayVoice( void )
00417 {
00418 //    CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
00419 
00420       // gender?
00421 
00422       if( fCharacterIsMale == TRUE )
00423       {
00424         switch( iCurrentVoices )
00425             {
00426               case( 0 ):
00427                     return( PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Speech\\051_001.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN ) );      
00428                     break;
00429                   case( 1 ):
00430                 return( PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Speech\\052_001.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN ) );    
00431                     break;
00432                   case( 2 ):
00433                         return( PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Speech\\053_001.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN ) );  
00434                     break;
00435                   case( 3 ):
00436                         return( PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Speech\\057_001.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN ) );  
00437                     break;
00438             }
00439       }
00440       else
00441       {
00442     switch( iCurrentVoices )
00443             {
00444               case( 0 ):
00445                         return( PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Speech\\054_001.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN ) );  
00446                     break;
00447               case( 1 ):
00448                         return( PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Speech\\055_001.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN ) );  
00449                     break;
00450                   case( 2 ):
00451             return( PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Speech\\056_001.wav", RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN ) );  
00452                     break;
00453             }
00454 
00455       }
00456       return 0;
00457 }

00460 void CreateIMPVoiceMouseRegions( void )
00461 {
00462   // will create mouse regions needed for the IMP voices page
00463       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gVoicePortraitRegion, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 200, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 176 ,LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 200 + 100, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 176 + 100,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00464                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, IMPPortraitRegionButtonCallback ); 
00465  
00466   
00467       MSYS_AddRegion( &gVoicePortraitRegion );
00468 
00469       return;
00470 }
00471 
00472 void DestroyIMPVoiceMouseRegions( void )
00473 {
00474   // will destroy already created mouse reiogns for IMP voices page
00475   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gVoicePortraitRegion );
00476 
00477       return;
00478 }

00480 
00481 void IMPPortraitRegionButtonCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00482 {     
00483       // callback handler for imp portrait region button events
00484 
00485   if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00486   {
00487         return;
00488   }
00489   if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00490   { 
00491     if( ! SoundIsPlaying( uiVocVoiceSound ) )
00492             {
00493        uiVocVoiceSound = PlayVoice( );
00494             }
00495             
00496   }
00497 
00498       return;
00499 }

00502 void RenderVoiceIndex( void )
00503 {
00504 
00505       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
00506       INT16 sX, sY;
00507 
00508       // render the voice index value on the the blank portrait
00509       swprintf( sString, L"%s %d", pIMPVoicesStrings[ 0 ], iCurrentVoices + 1 );
00510 
00511       FindFontCenterCoordinates( 290 + LAPTOP_UL_X, 0, 100, 0, sString, FONT12ARIAL, &sX, &sY );
00512 
00513       SetFont( FONT12ARIAL );
00514       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00515       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00516 
00517       mprintf( sX, iScreenHeightOffset + 320, sString );
00518 
00519       return;
00520 }
